last_episode_to_air.name: The Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: Recovering from the tragic events of Season 4, the East Los High crew prepares to leave high school behind, and maybe even East LA, as they begin a journey of self-discovery and learn the true meaning of love, family and friendship.

name: East Los High
overview: East Los High is not your typical high school. Dance, sex, romance, and mystery are at the heart of this inner city school in East LA where two teenage cousins—Jessie, a 16-year-old virgin and Maya, a troubled runaway with a violent past —fall in love with Jacob, a popular football player. From this forbidden love triangle, Maya, Jessie and Jacob, along with their close friends must face true-to-life decisions during a single dramatic and breath-taking year that will mark their lives forever.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The series revolves around two teenage cousins—Jessie, who is a studious virgin, and Maya, a troubled runaway—who fall in love with Jacob, a popular football player. From this love triangle, Maya and Jessie must face true-to-life decisions involving sex, drugs, pregnancy, infidelity and peer pressure that will decide which one of them gets the boy and mark their lives forever.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: All the sex, romance, and mystery continue when Ceci returns to East Los High to coach the Bomb Squad. She struggles to take the unruly dance team to the state championships while dealing with her own issues at home as a single mom in a relationship that becomes unexpectedly violent. The East Los High hallways are filled with a new cast of students risking it all for love, leading up to a scandalous turn of events that makes this another breathtaking and suspenseful school year.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Camila finally confronts a dark secret from her past. But in trying to keep her sister Gina and boyfriend Nic from harm, she risks losing her own life and her one true love. Meanwhile, the stakes are higher than ever when Ceci invites boys to join the Bomb Squad and the sexy new team takes on some stiff competition.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: The seniors get ready for graduation and saying goodbye to East Los High. When school is out for the summer, the new Bomb Squad heads off to dance camp with sexy newcomers who tempt Gina and Eddie’s relationship, on and off the dance floor. Camila and Jesus rekindle their love affair and must fight against the odds as they attempt to live a crime-free life. Ceci decides to chase her dreams, but finds that reality is tougher than she imagined, and when Jacob misbehaves, hearts are broken and the family business is threatened in more ways than one. This season, wedding bells ring while danger lurks in the streets of East LA, and the students must rise to action for what they believe in. Someone will risk it all to fight for their future and for true love, making this an unforgettable summer.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Recovering from the tragic events of Season 4, the East Los High crew prepares to leave high school behind, and maybe even East LA, as they begin a journey of self-discovery and learn the true meaning of love, family and friendship in this romantic, sexy and emotional series finale.

episodes.name: This Year's Winter King & Queen
episodes.overview: The Winter Formal ends with a sex scandal that opens the door for Jessie to finally hook up with Jacob. But Jessie’s life is complicated by the sudden appearance of her cousin, Maya, a runaway teen with a mysterious past.

episodes.name: The Patron Saint of Lost Causes
episodes.overview: Now that she’s dating Jacob, Jessie is tempted to give up her membership to the “Virgin’s Club” while Maya runs into trouble when she starts dealing stolen drugs. Vanessa finds out who shot her sex tape.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Bomb Squad
episodes.overview: After a drug-related shooting, Maya finds herself on the run again. At the dance team tryouts, it’s “Jessie vs. Vanessa”. The identity of the person who shot Vanessa’s sex tape is revealed.

episodes.name: Meet the New Busboy
episodes.overview: Jessie’s romance with Jacob heats up, testing her willpower. Maya tries to clean up her act but trouble still follows her at East Los High and on the street. Vanessa announces a mandatory “initiation” party at her house.

episodes.name: The Initiation
episodes.overview: Jessie unleashes her wild side when she meets Cristian, a hot dancer, at Vanessa’s house party. Rejected by Jacob, Vanessa plots against him while Maya receives a call from the dead.

episodes.name: Bang the Virgin
episodes.overview: Jacob and Maya get to know each other while working at his father’s taquería. Both Jessie and Ceci receive news that rock their worlds and Vanessa makes a risky decision in the name of revenge.

episodes.name: Did You Just Become My Boss?
episodes.overview: Jessie’s private dance lessons with Cristian are so sexy, she forgets about all her troubles at home. Maya’s healthy Mexican dishes inspire Jacob to revamp his father’s struggling taquería. The Martinez home gets a beautiful surprise visitor.

episodes.name: Maya's Secret Recipes
episodes.overview: Maya and Jacob bond over the makeover of the taquería but Maya doesn’t realize that Ramon is closing in on her. Jessie gets more “privates” with Cristian while Ceci suspects she’s being poisoned by Abe’s evil mom.

episodes.name: Some Guys Will Screw Anything
episodes.overview: “Dance Five” comes to East Los High! As Jessie preps for the big audition, her bond with Cristian grows stronger – on and off the dance floor. Maya’s fashion makeover steals Jacob’s attention while Ceci gets a reality check on Abe and her future.

episodes.name: Why Did I Have to Get Pregnant?
episodes.overview: Maya fights off her attraction for Jacob. Vanessa pressures Cristian to seal the deal with Jessie, and Ceci is in turmoil over her pregnancy. Meanwhile, Maya’s dangerous past finally catches up with her.

episodes.name: We Shouldn’t Be Doing This
episodes.overview: During one unforgettable night of romance, seduction and betrayal, Maya and Jessie are tempted to surrender to their true passions. Ceci continues to weigh her options.

episodes.name: I’m Gonna Give Him What He Wants
episodes.overview: Jessie transforms into a sexy vixen to get what she wants. Maya decides whether she should follow her heart or do right by her family. Cristian blackmails Vanessa and Ceci is on the streets again.

episodes.name: One Month Later
episodes.overview: The Bomb Squad performs on “Dance Five”! Jacob and Maya’s success with the taquería leaves them eager to explore one another. Jessie’s mom discovers her daughter’s secret.

episodes.name: Damn! Why Didn’t We Wait?
episodes.overview: Jacob gets a big surprise. Jessie’s ailing mom asks Jacob to make her a promise he can’t break. Maya’s torn between family and love.

episodes.name: I Don’t Think I Can Do This
episodes.overview: A wedding announcement at East Los High opens the doors to gossip, excitement and high drama. Maya meets up with a former “customer” and goes back to her old ways.

episodes.name: She Dumped You. Move On!
episodes.overview: It’s senior prom time at East Los High! Jacob struggles to forget Maya while she pushes her limits as a stripper on and off the stage in Hollywood. Ceci settles into the reality of having a baby.

episodes.name: I Think She’s Dead
episodes.overview: Jacob discovers where Maya’s working and can’t believe his eyes. He tries to bring her back to East LA but it might be too late for Maya. Jessie befriends Father Rodolfo, a handsome priest, who has a mysterious connection to her family’s past.

episodes.name: The Heart Always Knows
episodes.overview: Too much drinking, drugging and stripping finally catch up with Maya. Ceci tries to let go of her baby daddy and Jessie is faced with a great loss.

episodes.name: She’s My Mother
episodes.overview: A funeral in East LA brings with it much intrigue, an unexpected confession and a surprise visit from a sexy relative. Maya and Jacob meet again and Jessie asks Maya for a very big favor.

episodes.name: She Swallowed the Worm
episodes.overview: Maya finally finds out who her father is. Ceci goes into labor at Jessie’s house and there is no help in sight.

episodes.name: In Blood or Money
episodes.overview: Maya goes in search of her father while Jessie makes plans for her future. Vanessa feels the heat at the Dance Five finals and has to face a difficult truth.

episodes.name: Your Time Is Up
episodes.overview: East Los High students get ready for a wedding they will never forget. Maya and Reina plan their next move but don’t realize their lives are in danger.

episodes.name: Good Girls Don’t
episodes.overview: It’s the big wedding day and the bride and groom get ready to walk down the aisle. Meanwhile, Ramon is still on the hunt for Maya and closer than ever to getting his revenge.

episodes.name: Build a Future Worthy of You
episodes.overview: In the final episode, Jessie needs to make a life-changing decision. Will there be a happy ending? Who will make it to graduation? Also, see where the East Los crew lands, one year later.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The series revolves around two teenage cousins—Jessie, who is a studious virgin, and Maya, a troubled runaway—who fall in love with Jacob, a popular football player. From this love triangle, Maya and Jessie must face true-to-life decisions involving sex, drugs, pregnancy, infidelity and peer pressure that will decide which one of them gets the boy and mark their lives forever.

episodes.name: New Dance Coach in Da House
episodes.overview: It’s a new school year and tensions are flaring at East Los High after a popular student goes missing. The Bomb Squad competes against its biggest rival while dance captain Camila and her sister Gina each deal with shocking revelations.

episodes.name: Best Friends With Benefits
episodes.overview: Ceci returns to East Los High to coach the Bomb Squad, but the team’s bad behavior tempers her excitement. Camila’s budding love affair is complicated by the arrival of Nicolas, Jocelyn’s foster brother.

episodes.name: Meet Starfighter
episodes.overview: As Homecoming night approaches, Camila must decide between two invitations. Fed up with the Bomb Squad’s bad attitude, Ceci finds a way to put the team in their place.

episodes.name: The Queen of Ugly and the King of Fools
episodes.overview: Homecoming is here! Gina debates losing her virginity while Camila and Jocelyn are both presented with tempting situations. Ceci struggles with Pedro’s jealousy.

episodes.name: Lesbians Out Loud
episodes.overview: Gina’s plans to give up her “V-card” go in an unexpected direction. Nicolas goes to great lengths to impress Camila. Ceci’s relationship with Pedro takes a dark turn.

episodes.name: Luchadoras!
episodes.overview: Faced with a dilemma, Camila reverts back to old habits. Ceci puts the Bomb Squad through some rigorous training, just as they have to face an unexpected enemy.

episodes.name: Love Spells Are the Hardest
episodes.overview: The Bomb Squad competes in an epic battle at the Highland Park competition. Pedro’s jealousy grows even more dangerous. Camila attempts to make things right with Jocelyn.

episodes.name: I Ain't No Victim
episodes.overview: Camila and Nicolas party it up on the Vegas Strip. Jocelyn’s life is turned upside down when her secret goes public. Pedro realizes he needs to change his ways.

episodes.name: Beauty Queens Don't Wear Trash
episodes.overview: Tiffany’s actions threaten to expose her affair. Ceci goes to new lengths to keep herself and her daughter safe. Camila joins Nicolas in the recording studio.

episodes.name: Just the Tip
episodes.overview: Nicolas and Camila throw a blowout party at Remy’s loft. Things get hot and heavy for more than one East Los couple. Ceci plots a risky escape.

episodes.name: It Was an Accident
episodes.overview: A sexting scandal takes East Los High by storm and Gina is caught in the middle. Another student’s disappearance causes Camila and Jocelyn to fear for the worst. Nicolas tries to quit his “internship” but may be in too deep.

episodes.name: The Monster's Back
episodes.overview: Camila and Jocelyn continue the search for their friend. The Bomb Squad prepares to compete for regional championships without its best dancer.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: All the sex, romance, and mystery continue when Ceci returns to East Los High to coach the Bomb Squad. She struggles to take the unruly dance team to the state championships while dealing with her own issues at home as a single mom in a relationship that becomes unexpectedly violent. The East Los High hallways are filled with a new cast of students risking it all for love, leading up to a scandalous turn of events that makes this another breathtaking and suspenseful school year.

episodes.name: La Virgen de East Los High
episodes.overview: The Bomb Squad dancers throw Ceci a wild bachelorette party. But will Ceci say, “I do”?

episodes.name: The Bitch is Back
episodes.overview: An old frenemy threatens the Bomb Squad’s chances of winning Regionals. Maya has a big surprise for Jacob.

episodes.name: End of an Era
episodes.overview: Tiffany throws a hot pool party while Jacob and Maya make some major plans.

episodes.name: Sisters Before Misters
episodes.overview: The Bomb Squad is going co-ed. But where are the male dancers?

episodes.name: From Witch to Bitch
episodes.overview: At a music video shoot, Camila goes on her first drug run. Will it also be her last?

episodes.name: Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: It’s Valentine’s Day and the future of the Bomb Squad is at stake.

episodes.name: Scar Wars
episodes.overview: When a drug deal goes bad, Camila and Jesus are forced to improvise.

episodes.name: I’m Not Eating Mexican
episodes.overview: The male dancers are arrested on their way to their first music video shoot.

episodes.name: Road Trip!
episodes.overview: An unexpected romance is born on the road to Yuma. But will it die there?

episodes.name: Mexifornia
episodes.overview: A big secret is exposed at a national dance competition. Will the Bomb Squad be banned from performing?

episodes.name: Playing With My Balls
episodes.overview: A life is in danger when someone from the past comes knocking. And he’s out for revenge.

episodes.name: Dance Battle
episodes.overview: Dance Battle is on and much is at stake when someone leaves, someone returns, someone is betrayed… and someone dies.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Camila finally confronts a dark secret from her past. But in trying to keep her sister Gina and boyfriend Nic from harm, she risks losing her own life and her one true love. Meanwhile, the stakes are higher than ever when Ceci invites boys to join the Bomb Squad and the sexy new team takes on some stiff competition.

episodes.name: No Shirt, No Shoes, No Cholos
I Hope She Was Worth It
Caliente!
episodes.overview: Jacob's BRO party gets out of control when the Bomb Squad performs a scandalous number that lands Gina in hot water.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: The seniors get ready for graduation and saying goodbye to East Los High. When school is out for the summer, the new Bomb Squad heads off to dance camp with sexy newcomers who tempt Gina and Eddie’s relationship, on and off the dance floor. Camila and Jesus rekindle their love affair and must fight against the odds as they attempt to live a crime-free life. Ceci decides to chase her dreams, but finds that reality is tougher than she imagined, and when Jacob misbehaves, hearts are broken and the family business is threatened in more ways than one. This season, wedding bells ring while danger lurks in the streets of East LA, and the students must rise to action for what they believe in. Someone will risk it all to fight for their future and for true love, making this an unforgettable summer.

episodes.overview: Recovering from the tragic events of Season 4, the East Los High crew prepares to leave high school behind, and maybe even East LA, as they begin a journey of self-discovery and learn the true meaning of love, family and friendship.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Recovering from the tragic events of Season 4, the East Los High crew prepares to leave high school behind, and maybe even East LA, as they begin a journey of self-discovery and learn the true meaning of love, family and friendship in this romantic, sexy and emotional series finale.
